items.title: Score Baseus’ 120W 6-in-1 charging station for your desktop while it’s nearly 50% off at $25.50 all-time low
items.summary:
Courtesy of Baseus’ official Amazon storefront, you can now score the brand’s 120W 6-in-1 desktop charging station for $25.64 with free shipping for Prime members or in orders over $35. Don’t forget to enter promo code JPCI7QVK during checkout to see the discounted price. This is regularly a $50 charging unit, which is now seeing a 48% discount. Today’s deal shaves $24 off its usual going rate to land it $3 below its previous all-time low it first hit during the Black Friday sale last year. It’s a fairly simple charger that ditches all the flashy features like displays and retractable cables in favor of delivering a straightforward charging experience, and it’s now down to the lowest price today. Head below for more details.

items.title: Whisker’s Valentine’s sale offers up to $150 savings on premium Litter-Robot bundles, prices start from $499
items.summary:
One of my absolute favorite cat-focused brands, Whisker, is currently having its Valentine’s Day Sale and seeing up to $150 discounts across its lineup of self-cleaning litter box bundles. Of course, the most affordable of the three new models and the legacy models is the latest Whisker Litter-Robot EVO that starts from $599 shipped, while its 3-year warranty bundle is priced at $699 shipped – both of which aren’t seeing price cuts, sadly, but retain more accessible pricing compared to others. Where the savings start is on the Starter Bundle for $729 shipped, down from $832, and coming with a litter-trap mat, a 3-pack of odor traps, 25 waste drawer liners, a 20-pound bag of litter, and a 3-year extended warranty, which comes in $53 under the pricing we saw during Black Friday and Christmas sales for a new all-time low. Head below to browse the full lineup of new and legacy offers during this event.

One of the more interesting cases that released for iPhone 17 came by way of the Beats Kickstand model with MagSafe. items.title: This 5,000mAh mophie power bank is about the size of lipstick, and it’s down to just $13 today (57% off)
items.summary:
Mophie 5,000mAh USB-C Power Bank

Buy for $13 (Reg. $30)

What we love

This is a nice alternative if you’re not a fan of snapping MagSafe power banks onto the back of your phone. You’re looking at a compact battery pack, which is roughly the size of a lipstick. It packs a 5,000mAh battery and uses a USB-C port to deliver up to 20W of power. You also get simple LED indicators that let you quickly check how much charge is left.

items.title: Anker SOLIX weekend flash sale drops 2,560Wh F2600 power station to second-best $899 price, more from $430
items.summary:
While Anker doesn’t seem to be having a Super Bowl sale like other brands, we are currently seeing a weekend flash sale on an array of power stations ranging from 768Wh to 7,680Wh capacities at up to 51% off, not to mention a wider array of power deals. Among the bunch, one of the more budget-friendly solutions is Anker’s SOLIX F2600 Portable Power Station at $899 shipped, which is out of stock over at Amazon right now, but is matching the direct pricing for its previous-generation F2000 power station, while coming in $1 under the Amazon pricing for that same model, making it a far better deal. Not only that, but this price has only been beaten out by last week’s one-time $849 flash sale low. All-in-all, you’re getting $1,500 off the $2,399 full price at the second-best rate we have tracked. Head below for the entire flash sale lineup while it lasts through Sunday.

Spotify changes Developer Mode to require a Premium subscription and reduces the cap on test users per app from 25 to five, to curb AI-aided or automated usage  —  Spotify is changing how its APIs work in Developer Mode, its layer that lets developers test their third-party applications using the audio platform's APIs.
